title: Königeinsamkeit

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect two people tonight with Basic defense. Those who they visit will have the Defense value reduced by 1.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You think you do not deserve to be spared, so you can't defend yourself. Even when you're unseen...
- If you successfully protect someone with your ability, you can turn into CORRUPTED ASGORE during the day.

desc:
Post 1407A
*This is for the greater good.*
